CalculatedMember.name: Poverty Rate
CalculatedMember.Formula: CASE WHEN [Poverty Status].[Poverty Status].Level is [Poverty Status].[Poverty Status].[Poverty Status] THEN 0 WHEN 1 = 1 THEN ([Poverty Status].[Poverty Status].&[0], [Measures].[Poverty Population]) / [Measures].[Poverty Population] END
